messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

LGTM yay!
On Feb 3, 2012 3:17 PM, <rsc@golang.org> wrote:

> Reviewers: golang-dev_googlegroups.com,
>
> Message:
> Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,
>
> I'd like you to review this change to
> https://go.googlecode.com/hg/
>
>
> Description:
> build: delete buildscripts, runtime scripts
>
> Please review this at http://codereview.appspot.com/**5620059/<http://codereview.appspot.com/5620059/>
>
> Affected files:
>  R src/buildscript.sh
>  R src/buildscript/darwin_386.sh
>  R src/buildscript/darwin_amd64.**sh
>  R src/buildscript/freebsd_386.sh
>  R src/buildscript/freebsd_amd64.**sh
>  R src/buildscript/linux_386.sh
>  R src/buildscript/linux_amd64.sh
>  R src/buildscript/linux_arm.sh
>  R src/buildscript/netbsd_386.sh
>  R src/buildscript/netbsd_amd64.**sh
>  R src/buildscript/openbsd_386.sh
>  R src/buildscript/openbsd_amd64.**sh
>  R src/buildscript/plan9_386.sh
>  R src/buildscript/windows_386.sh
>  R src/buildscript/windows_amd64.**sh
>  R src/pkg/runtime/autogen.sh
>  R src/pkg/runtime/mkgodefs.sh
>
>
>

*** Submitted as f01e8edddf01 ***

build: delete buildscripts, runtime scripts

R=golang-dev, bradfitz
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/5620059

subject: code review 5620059: build: delete buildscripts, runtime scripts
